src:
Levandovski mora na operaciju, pauza 7-10 dana
Poljak kod hirurga zbog problema s leđima

03 Nov 2019

Vodeći strelac Bundeslige i Bajerna iz Minhena Robert Levandovski doživeo je mali peh. Poljak će zbog problema sa leđima morati da bude podvrgnut maloj hiruškoj intervenciji koja će ga odvojiti od terena na sedam do deset dana, objavili su danas poljski mediji.
Ali, Levandovskom nisu ugroženi nastupi za Bavarce, najpre protiv Olimpijakosa (sreda) u Ligi šampiona zatim i protiv Borusije iz Dortmunda u Klasikeru (subota) pošto će zahvat biti izveden sledeće nedelje kad počne reprezentativna pauza.
Tako Poljak neće igrati za nacionalni tim u novembarskom "prozoru", ali to ne brine tamošnje ljubitelje fudbala pošto je plasman na EURO 2020. već obezbeđen.
Očekuje se da Robert Levandovski bude fit za gostovanje u Baogradu protiv Crvene zvezde u petom kolu Lige šampiona (26. novembra).
Foto: Reuters
text:
Levandovsky must undergo surgery, a break of 7-10 days
Regiment at the surgeon for back problems

03 Nov 2019

Leading Bundesliga and Bayern Munich goalkeeper Robert Levandovski experienced a small inferno. The Polish man will have to undergo a small surgical intervention due to his back problems, which will separate him from the field for seven to ten days, Polish media reported today.
But Levandovski has not been threatened by the performances for the Bavarians, first against Olympiakos (Wednesday) in the Champions League and then against Borussia Dortmund in Klasiker (Saturday) as the operation will be carried out next week when the representative break begins.
So the Pole will not play for the national team in November's "window", but that does not worry football fans there since the placement at EURO 2020 has already been secured.
Robert Levandovski is expected to be fit to host Baograd against Red Star in the fifth round of the Champions League (November 26).
Photo by Reuters
